title: Can we have a remake everytime someone choses to play ezreal ADC
body: Why is he even in the game anymore?

replies.body:
Why is he even in the game anymore? cause ezreal jungle is currently top tier.


Like every other champs, he has his ups and downs.
ezreal jungle is poop. Any adc except for kindred (who is truly a jungler) is poop in the jungle. A xin zhao or warwick can just sit on his butthole and doggystyle all day.
In what Lala land are you currently in?
Im currently in reality. And im telling you ezreal jungle is poop
Whatever you're in isn't reality because Ezreal jungle is currently top tier whether you want to believe it or not.
Did You Agree To The "Terms And Agreements" Because i really don't think any 13+ kid would call Ez ADC "Poop"

Frankly they just need to finally decide if they want him to be an AP Mage or ADC, having half of your skills become useless damage wise because you build ether AP or AD is annoying, even those meant to build Hybrid like Irelia and Jax don't lose out as much as Ezreal does
